long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortless AEM Management with AEM Toolkit
Streamline your Adobe Experience Manager workflow with AEM Toolkit, the ultimate companion for AEM developers and content managers. Whether you're switching between author and publish instances, debugging workflows, or managing multiple environments, this extension takes the hassle out of AEM navigation.

What Makes AEM Toolkit Awesome?
Seamless View Switching
Instantly toggle between Edit Mode and Published View without manually adjusting URLs.

Multi-Instance Management
Effortlessly switch between multiple AEM environments, configured right from the extension’s settings.

Custom Context Menus
Save time with right-click shortcuts to key AEM tools like OSGi Bundles or CRXDE, tailored to your instance.

Built-In Action Buttons
Automatic buttons on AEM pages let you:

Jump to Edit Mode.
Preview Published Content.
Switch between Author and Publish environments with a click.
Who’s It For?
Developers: Debug workflows faster with direct access to AEM tools.
Content Managers: Preview published content with ease.
Teams: Manage environments across multiple projects or clients effortlessly.
Getting Started
Install the Extension
Configure your AEM instances in the intuitive settings page.

Switch and Navigate
Use in-page buttons or context menus to navigate seamlessly between environments and views.

Optimize Your Workflow
Adjust settings like default URLs, visibility of tools, and new tab preferences to match your workflow.

Your Privacy Matters
AEM Toolkit does not collect, share, or transmit your data. All configurations are securely stored in Chrome's sync storage, ensuring seamless transitions between devices.

Support and Feedback
Got questions or suggestions? Reach out via GitHub Issues or email us at comicbit@gmail.com.

Transform how you work with Adobe Experience Manager. Try AEM Toolkit today!
